newsitem.title: UK: Credit Suisse set calls on Swiss service sector.
newsitem.headline: Credit Suisse set calls on Swiss service sector.

text.p: Credit Suisse (Zurich) has issued 22 million American-style call warrants on Swiss blue chips in the service sector, lead manager Credit Suisse said. There are five million warrants on Swiss Bank Corp, four million warrants on Union Bank of switzerland, five million warrants on Swiss Reinsurance, three million warrants on Winterthur Insurance, three million warrants on Zurich Insurance and two million warrants on Swissair.
